sorcer.core.context

Class Contexts

  • java.lang.Object
    • sorcer.core.context.Contexts
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SorcerConstants

    public class Contexts
extends java.lang.Object
implements SorcerConstants
    The Contexts class provides utility services to ServiceContext that are required by requestors such as the the SORCER graphical user interface and and any complex SORCER requestor or service provider.

    • Method Detail

      • getValuesStartsWith

        public static java.util.List getValuesStartsWith(Context context,
                                                 java.lang.String subpath)
                                          throws ContextException
        Returns list of all values that are referenced by paths that start with the given subpath string.

        Caution - a match does not indicate the returned results are subpaths of given path. For instance, consider context that contains paths. It is recommended to end a matched substring with the context path separator (SORCER.CPS).

        • a/b/c
        • a/bb/d
        a call to this method with path="a/b" will return both "a/b/c" and "a/bb/d" and only the first is a subpath.
        Parameters:
        context - ServiceContext to query
        subpath - the match string
        Returns:
        a Vector of context values maching a path
        Throws:
        ContextException

        public static java.util.ArrayList getKeysStartsWith(Context context,
                                                    java.lang.String subpath)
                                             throws ContextException
        Returns list of paths that start with the given subpath string.

        Caution - a match does not indicate the returned paths are subpaths of given path. It is recommended to end a matched substring with the context path separator (SORCER.CPS).

        Parameters:
        context - ServiceContext to query
        subpath - the match string
        Returns:
        a Vector of matching paths
        Throws:
        ContextException
